Home.title: Privacy, Security and everything in between
Home.desc: Xanzhu is a platform for sharing knowledge on technology and online privacy. Our articles, guides, and reviews teach users how to use technology safely and protect their data online, covering topics such as VPNs, password managers, two-factor authentication, and online safety. Learn more about how to protect your privacy online and sign up for our newsletter to get the latest cybersecurity tips.

meta.title: Security Toolkit: Essential for Online Safety
meta.description: Stay safe online with our curated list of the best security tools and services. From phishing protection to malware reporting, we've got you covered.

phish.title: Reporting Phishing Scams
phish.subheading: Don't Fall for Scams: Find resources to detect and report Phishing.
phish.p-1: Phishing explained: A type of online scam where attackers trick individuals into providing sensitive information, such as login credentials or financial information. These scams can appear on websites, emails, and text messages and often take the form of links to popular websites or fake sites that look legitimate.
phish.p-2: Detection: it is important to first check if the link has already been reported. There are several online services that can be used to scan the URL of the phishing link. It is important not to click on the link and instead, copy the link address and paste it into the scanning service.
phish.google: , blocks content across the google ecosystem.
phish.microsoft: , blocks content on edge and windows services
phish.urlscan: , provides helpful information about the website such as IP/domain details

explain.a11y: Web accessibility ensures everyone can access and use products or services regardless of their abilities. It is critical for developers and designers to consider these factors, such as ensuring that text sizing, color, and contrast are readable and meet AA standards, providing alternate text for images, and other features that work with screen readers. Good design stems from how user-friendly your website is to everyone.
explain.malware: This is a type of attack that runs in the background and can cause a lot of problems for your computer. This attack directly affects the device being used by slowing it down, adding programs, and more. It is usually caused by downloading files or opening links that are infected.
explain.phishing: An attack method commonly used to obtain user information is phishing. This is a highly targeted attack and can be seen in emails, phone calls, or messages. It works by getting the victim to open a link, download a file, and enter or provide account information to critical accounts such as Banks, Phone Companies and more.

About.p1: Cybersecurity is a crucial part of the internet and is a growing concern for many users and businesses. Attacks can strike at any moment, devastating individuals and organisations. That's why we created Xanzhu.
About.p2: Our mission is to become a leading source for information and knowledge on security, privacy, and accessibility.
About.p3: We want to provide a space for technology lovers, as well as average consumers and business owners, to gain insight into how to protect themselves online.
About.p4: Knowing how to protect yourself or your business is important. Privacy and security should be a top priority.
About.p5: We are new and will likely make a few mistakes. But we're passionate about making the internet a safer place, and we hope you'll join us in developing the next standard of security practices and guidelines.
About.desc: Xanzhu.com - Your cybersecurity hub. Protecting you online with valuable insights on security, privacy, and accessibility. Join us!
